sections.heading: ACTIVE DUTY MILITARY PERSONNEL OR THEIR SPOUSES Active duty military personnel, or their spouse, shall designate a home state where the individual has a current license in good standing
sections.text: The individual may retain the home state designation during the period the service member is on active duty. Subs
